params.name: num_chroma
params.description: Number of chroma bins to use.

params.name: chroma_length
params.description: Maximum chroma duration if audio is used to condition the model. Corresponds to the maximum duration used during training.

params.name: kwargs
params.description: Dictionary of keyword arguments. Notably:text_encoder (PretrainedConfig, optional) — An instance of a configuration object thatdefines the text encoder config.audio_encoder (PretrainedConfig, optional) — An instance of a configuration object thatdefines the audio encoder config.decoder (PretrainedConfig, optional) — An instance of a configuration object that definesthe decoder config.
